name: Tomas and Lily's rhythm adventure
description:
Tomas and Lily meet new friends!

Click on the right creatures to get the highest score possible!

you can read the instructions in the game.

Follow on YouTube (there is a problem with the link inside the game, it would be better if you click on this on):
